body: p)2 its wrong, but that they agree only for one night, after they finish, gyaru tells him that she can't reciprocate his feelings and to call him sister. I don't know what happens in chapter 3 as it wasn't translated or at least I can't find it, but from the looks of it, they go to the onsen, sleep separately, and maybe get together, but idk. So no, this isn't any swinging, also the comment below mines says that the guys end up with their desired partners while the girls had to settle? its looks quite the opposite where the guys had to settle for while the girls ended up with their desired partners, but again idk.

ight so im here to explain the first 2 chapters. First i want to say both guys are mc's of their respective chapters. To make it clear, mc 1 likes black hair girl but she likes mc 2 while he likes gyaru looking girl but she likes mc 1, so its a full circle. In chapter 1, black hair girl gets rejected by mc 2 and mc 1 comforts her and while they have sex he confesses to her, but she thinks that he's doing that to help her forget mc 2, but in the middle of cumming she calls our mc 2's name. At the end, he tells her that he will root for her love and to continue pursuing for mc 2 and telling her that if anything goes bad, that to remember that there is someone here who will love her. Meanwhile gyaru girl overhears. Start of chapter 2, gyaru's and mc 2's parents get remarried so now they are siblings. Gyaru gets drunk and wants to take a shower. Mc 2 checks up on her and thats when gyaru entices him. After he starts touching her in lewd ways, she becomes sober enough to understand that p)1
